amendment.description: To direct the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service to submit a report on avian mortality at communication towers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 50 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 50 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S1431-1433; text: CR S1433) To direct the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service to submit a report on avian mortality at communication towers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 50 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 50 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Sarbanes.
